label: 所司
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A general term for an official of a government agency. Also, the second-ranking post within the vassal-control board (samurai dokoro) of the Kamakura Bakufu; this became hereditary within the Nagasaki family. In Muromachi times shoshi was the chief post in the samurai dokoro.　[侍所、長崎]
